content:
The "game-changer" comment is a great clue!

With that in mind, I'm going to take a guess that the movie might be "Spider-Man: No Way Home" (2021).

This movie was a recent release, and it's been widely praised for its impact on the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The film's plot and ending have been described as "game-changing" by many fans and critics, as it sets up a new direction for the Spider-Man franchise and the MCU as a whole.

The movie also features Tom Holland's performance as Spider-Man, which has been widely praised, and the film's visual effects are stunning.

Does that sound like the movie you might be thinking of?

(And if not, I can certainly keep trying to help you figure out which movie it might be!)
